parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets unit faction. Factions were introduced in <template><title>arma2</title></template> and are defined under ''CfgFactionClasses''.

{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"font-size: 0.9em; white-space: nowrap"
! Side
! <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template>
! <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2oa</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51</value></part></template>
! <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center" <template><title>!</title></template> [[west]]/[[blufor]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 --></comment>
* USMC
* CDF

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 OA --></comment>
* BIS_US
* BIS_CZ
* BIS_GER
* BIS_BAF (BAF DLC)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 3 --></comment>
* BLU_F (NATO)
* BLU_G_F (FIA)
* BLU_T_F (Pacific NATO, Apex Expansion)
* BLU_CTRG_F (Pacific CTRG, Apex Expansion)
* BLU_GEN_F (Gendarmerie, Apex Expansion)
* BLU_W_F (Woodland NATO, Contact Expansion)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center" <template><title>!</title></template> [[east]]/[[opfor]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 --></comment>
* INS (ChDKZ)
* RU (Russia)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 OA --></comment>
* BIS_TK (Takistan army)
* BIS_TK_INS (TK insurgents)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 3 --></comment>
* OPF_F (Iranian CSAT)
* OPF_G_F (FIA)
* OPF_T_F (Chinese CSAT, Apex Expansion)
* OPF_R_F (Spetznatz, Contact Expansion)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center" <template><title>!</title></template> [[resistance]]/<br>[[independent]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 --></comment>
* GUE (Guerilla)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 OA --></comment>
* BIS_TK_GUE
* BIS_UN (United Nations)
* PMC_BAF (PMC DLC)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 3 --></comment>
* IND_F (AAF)
* IND_G_F (FIA)
* IND_C_F (Syndikat, Apex Expansion)
* IND_E_F (LDF, Contact Expansion)
* IND_L_F (Looters, Contact Expansion)

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center" <template><title>!</title></template> [[civilian]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 --></comment>
* CIV
* CIV_RU

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 2 OA --></comment>
* BIS_TK_CIV
* BIS_CIV_special

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <comment><!-- Arma 3 --></comment>
* CIV_F
* CIV_IDAP_F (Laws of War DLC)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> If a unit's faction is not defined in its config, an empty string is returned.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[faction]] unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _playerFaction = [[faction]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[Side]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Faction behaves slightly differently to [[side]]. Side can refer to the pilot or commander of a vehicle, but faction never changes. It always returns the 'country of manufacture'.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
